Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Address is the latest venture from the renowned real estate major called ‘True Value’. Whether you are an international organization of repute looking for an office in Ahmedabad or a start-up trying to get a flexible and cost-effective workspace, you have come to the right place. Just connect with us by submitting your information. Take the first step towards establishing yourself in Ahmedabad, and beyond.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Multiple co-working spaces available in a prime location at  Westgate
Multiple co-working spaces available in a prime location of Ahmedabad

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Say goodbye to the age-old constraints of the ancient office-room scenarios and say hello to a modern workspace that takes you several steps closer to reaching the pinnacle of success. BSQUARE Coworking Space is one of the pioneers in providing office space solutions in Ahmedabad. We have an experience of 10+ years in providing well-furnished and well-managed office space solutions in this city. Our centres are situated in the heart of Ahmedabad and cater to professionals from different walks of life. Our objective is to provide state-of-the-art, fully furnished and fully facilitated flexible offices and workspaces in different categories.

Everyone needs to have an affordable office without compromising on all the amenities that are crucial for the growth of an individual or company.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Be it budding entrepreneurs or striving working professionals, Connekt is a treasure trove of opportunities. The coworking office, Connekt, located in the heart of the city – Drive-in Road, is the best option for coworking with enthusiasts like yourselves. Sprawling over an area of 12,500 sq.ft. on the 13th floor of Gala Empire, Connekt is a 256-seater coworking space. They aim to provide 360º comprehensive solutions to the coworking members and increase their productivity in the best possible workspace by providing everything the members may need to succeed.
